@Shotamaster1911 As a matter of fact, I'd say the 8/10 you gave is quite reasonable, but not for the reason I thought it would be. The artist (santa) is known for its works, considering in this website the artist's mostly well-known works are the english-translated ones, which is likely related to deep feelings of love (there are 2 works, if excluding the Father-Daughter one). This isn't tagged Incest. However, instead of forbidden relationship of a woman and a little boy, this looks like the forbidden relationship of the sister and the little brother. We are only looking for the forbidden ones here in this Shotacon realm, to trigger our most basic nature of humanity: sexual pleasure and lust. In this Shotacon work, however, the forbidden couples look like they're almost showing real loves. When I saw this, it reminds me of the Incest works of Nakani, minus the artworks insinuating the wild part where the brother and sister are madly in lust.

This shotacon, in my opinion, is very good, the psychological aspect is lovely to a certain extent but after some time all you want to do is fap, I'd rate it on its own as a solid 5/10, I've seen better. Now on to the art style, it's very intriguing since it's a bit realistic while also maintaining the art style of say a manga like Kill La Kill or a cleaner version of Tokyo Ghoul with less of the darker monotone and more of the cleaner white color we see here, it's very good and clean looking and I rate it a very solid 7/10, it still sadly doesn't match up to say the style of Mitchling or Pochi-goya and some of our other gods of Shotacon but still it's good. Now on to the scenes which is as you all know my brothers the version reason we fap to hentai and not grotesque porn which has so many bad aspects to it, firstly the scenes of the forceful fucking by the shota are great and we rarely see that in shotacon since mostly the elder takes the roll. all in all a solid 8/10.
Shout out to Santa Claus for bringing out the best gifts
Shoutout to this shota for not being a weak willed, shy little boi like the other ones.
